channel.title: How to make automatic system message
channel.description: can some1 please give me a code and where to place it, for a automatic yell message where it would say like, dont forget to save account or dont forget to vote etc.. all i need is a bot or something please and thank you!

item.title: How to make automatic system message
item.dc:creator: @zingerman111 zingerman111
item.description:
@zingerman111 wrote:

try this code

public void mymessage() { EventManager.getSingleton().addEvent(new Event() { public void execute(EventContainer c) { int r3 = 0; r3 = Misc.random(6); if (r3 == 0) { sendMessage("[Notice]: Official site at - NRS3server.tk"); } else if (r3 == 1) { sendMessage("[Notice]: WE DO NOT ACCEPT RSGP FOR ANY REASON WHATSOEVER"); } else if (r3 == 2) { sendMessage("[Notice]: Visit our forums at *******************"); } else if (r3 == 3) { sendMessage("[Notice]: Feel free to ask any staff for help, as long as their not busy!"); } else if (r3 == 4) { sendMessage("[Notice]: Donate to Jahid or Sam Akin to keep us 24/7"); } else if (r3 == 5) { sendMessage("[Notice]: Dont forget to click save in your quest tab!"); } } }, 160000); //milisecondsservermessage };

Read full topic
item.source: How to make automatic system message

item.title: How to make automatic system message
item.dc:creator: @johnl17 johnl17
item.description:
@johnl17 wrote:

[quote=“Ags Rush, post:4, topic:425006”][quote author=johnl17 link=topic=527667.msg3846651#msg3846651 date=1323663527]

[code]public void mymessage() {
EventManager.getSingleton().addEvent(new Event() {
public void execute(EventContainer c) {

				sendMessage("<shad=15695415>[Your ServerName Here</col>]: Your Message Here");
			
			}
		}
	}, 160000); //milisecondsservermessage
;[/code]

Just pulled that outta a random PI source, forgot which 1
[/quote]

It’s good you helped him, try to either write your own, or give credits from the one you took.[/quote]

Sorry, but i dont know which server it came from, cuz the stuff was all renamed. I think it was insidiax, if soo kudo’s to him

Read full topic
